thread.title: Sarah
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Sarah

author: Sarah
title: Sarah
text: Four days ago, an itinerary and price were discussed and a agreed upon. The following days I received multiple emails and calls udpating the info provided. When they have access to the times & flights you are looking for, it can be a great deal. My sister in law loves to use AFG when flying from Florida to Paris.
